channel.title: How do I make Kalphite Gaurdians drop d chains?
channel.description: How do I make Kalphite Gaurdians drop d chains on my server its fr33sc4p3 based.. Sorry but im new to this :eek:[br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2007, 12:39:05 PM[/size][hr]Give me a answer :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: How do I make Kalphite Gaurdians drop d chains?
item.dc:creator: @HeavenScape HeavenScape
item.description:
@HeavenScape wrote:

[quote=“Mopar Helper, post:3, topic:68133”]If you firstly have the kalphite guardian spawned then go to
this file:
NPCDrops
NOTE : There are 3 files for this.

npcdrop = 1		1		3140	1	3140	2

add that at the bottom, if compiler gives errors tell me what it says,
by the way, remember to put it on top of:

 [ENDOFNPCDROPLIST]

Yay! Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make Kalphite Gaurdians drop d chains?
item.dc:creator: @kestral kestral
item.description:
@kestral wrote:

Ok Go into NPCdrops.cfg and change it correspondingly

Since i dont have the kalphite Guardians in my autospawn you must add it there and then add them in NPCdrops.cfg

//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 1 1 995 3 995 4 995 5 995 6 995 7 995 8 995 9 995 10 995 11 995 12 995 13 995 14 995 15

Thats what you should see in NPCdrops/cfg just add a row like the 1 above but change the NPCID the Iten and Amount

BTW ive never done this before im just working off the top of my head and hopefully the guardians will drop D Chains if not consult a proffesional hope i helped

Read full topic
